name: Persimmon Lassi
description: Bright orange, honey-sweet persimmons make a delicious alternative to mangoes in a yogurt-based lassi.
recipeIngredient: 2 medium-sized, ripe persimmons, quartered, core removed (see note)
1 tablespoon agave nectar or simple syrup (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Add persimmons, lime juice, and agave to blender and blend on high until completely smooth, about 1 minute. Add yogurt and ice and blend on high until smooth, about 30 seconds more. Transfer to one or two glasses and serve immediately.
